name: slave
content:

B2 a person who is legally owned by someone else and has to work for that person: Black slaves used to work on the cotton plantations of the southern United States. I'm tired of being treated like a slave!
More examplesFewer examplesa galley slavea slave and his masterSlaves were treated with sickening cruelty.The slaves were kept in bondage until their death.Get your own drink - I'm not your slave!
